fr.playsoft.android.tools.customcomponents.fragments

Class AUltraFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v4.app.Fragment
      • fr.playsoft.android.tools.customcomponents.fragments.AUltraFragment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ComponentCallbacks, View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, IUltraFragment, IManagerEventClient
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AUltraFragmentGallery, AUltraFragmentGrid, AUltraFragmentList, AUltraFragmentListPullToUpdate, AUltraFragmentMultiSwipe, AUltraFragmentSwipe

    public abstract class AUltraFragment
extends Fragment
implements IManagerEventClient, IUltraFragment
    Abstract class for Fragment class. Constains all needed tools like Toasts, Loading Dialogs Automatically registers to ManagerEvent class
    Author:
    Klawikowski
